column4: got an audio-book here, and want to transfer it to the MP3-Player... sadly the ID3-Tags are f..... up and i would like to remove them at all... so that i can sort them by filename
Sadly i know nether an tool too remove them at all, nor a tool to rename them all at the same time like in WIN
So that the filenames would be like 1(001).mp3 1(002).mp3 and so on
there should be an id3tag command line tool which could wipe them all
